name: nytimes
text:
Employers can require workers to get a Covid-19 vaccine and bar them from the workplace if they refuse, the federal government said in guidelines issued this week.
https://t.co/DwAbzPuOrR

name: nytimes
text:
RT @cliffordlevy: NEW: Ghislaine Maxwell Calls Jail Oppressive. Prosecutors Say She Has It Easy.
Maxwell, a longtime associate of Jeffrey Epstein, has asked to be released on $28.5 million bond as she awaits trial on federal charges.
https://t.co/SktsYvMsrn

name: nytimes
text: RT @BenWeiserNYT: NEW: She has her own shower, her own phone and exclusive use of two computers — even her own TV, prosecutors say. @amyjharris and I report on the fight over whether Ghislaine Maxwell should be released on bond pending trial. https://t.co/9sCQi1gz1L

name: nytimes
text: Breaking News: The FDA authorized Moderna’s vaccine for emergency use. It’s easier to store and handle than Pfizer’s, speeding access to more parts of the U.S. https://t.co/JDshIpWZ16

name: nytimes
text: RT @abbygoodnough: Here comes the second vaccine... https://t.co/3GURm6cyzj

name: nytimes
text:
RT @SherylNYT: NEW: The coronavirus vaccine is a big accomplishment for President Trump. But some of his backers don't want to take it. 

They are suspicious of government, worried about side effects. And conspiracy theories lurk in the background.
https://t.co/xjA4UR094u

name: nytimes
text:
United Airlines said on Friday that it was working with health officials to contact passengers who might have been exposed to the coronavirus by a male passenger who died after a medical emergency on a recent flight.
https://t.co/pyX9NboOpo

name: nytimes
text:
RT @KannoYoungs: New: Websites are popping up offering fraudulent deals for the coronavirus vaccines. 

ICE on Friday shut one down claiming to belong to MODERNA, one of the 1st schemes to use the name of a company approved by the United States to distribute the vaccine.
https://t.co/Ucaht58fBZ
